answers.answer: Hello,You need to consult your doctor with these symptoms.You need to be tested for diabetes HA1c and fasting blood sugar.Also recommend they do a thyroid screen.  Which shoudl consist of TSH, FT3, FT4 and antibodies.Your doctor should be able to direct appropriate testing when you see him / her and discuss your symptoms.

question: I have been feeling really run down for the past 7 months. Normally Im extremely fit do a lot of sport, but now i find it hard to do anything even cooking dinner. I eat really well, although im always thirsty i can drink up to 6 litres of water a day. My body aches if i do too much that being if i walk to car or kitchen, and is always tired but my mind is wide awake. Can anyone help me with these symptomsthank you
title: Body tired all the time mind awake
